summary:
Serhat is an exceptional finance & risk consultant known for his proactive approach, insatiable curiosity, and unwavering focus on achieving results. With his remarkable talent for analyzing, documenting, and explaining complex matters, he effortlessly bridges the gap between business and IT stakeholders.

Throughout his career, Serhat has successfully navigated the entire process from regulation to implementation. His ability to collaborate seamlessly between policy departments, IT, and business units makes him the perfect choice for driving success in complex, cross-domain projects. With his profound understanding of banking regulation, Serhat excels in conducting business analysis across various domains, including risk, finance, and IT.

Serhat is relentless in his pursuit of improving process effectiveness and efficiency. His expertise lies in regulatory change and data-driven initiatives such as BCBS239 (governance and implementation), PERDARR, LCR, interest rate risk reports/models, ALM, Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) reporting, Anacredit, Finrep, and Corep. These experiences have provided him with an unparalleled understanding of strategic data governance and reporting systems.

By leveraging his extensive knowledge in Collibra, IDQ, EDC, SQL, PowerBI, and other cutting-edge tools, Serhat brings unparalleled value to every project he undertakes. His unique skill set, combined with his relentless drive for excellence, sets him apart as a trusted advisor and an invaluable asset to any team.
